shows.title: Natural Remedies / Healing from Within
shows.first_half: First Half: Pharmacist Ben Fuchs shares natural health remedies and the vitamins, nutrients, and minerals that our bodies need to maintain good health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Licensed counselor and medical & emotional intuitive Katie Beecher will discuss her latest research and provide ways in which we can deal with anxiety, uncertainty, negativity, evil, and discord in our current climate.

shows.title: World Events / Angels & Consciousness
shows.first_half: First Half: Writer and documentary film producer G. Edward Griffin (author of "The Creature from Jekyll Island" about the creation of the Federal Reserve) will bring us his view on the events that are shaping our world and how to navigate from day to day.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Psychotherapist, spiritual teacher, and channel Corin Grillo will enlighten us on the powerful role angels play in our current planetary awakening. She'll explain how they guide us, and show us they're not just helpers but initiators of consciousness.
